page.title: 10HOUSING IN CURY/GUNWALLOE
page.content: There is a low density of housing in the Gunwallow/Cury area. It consists mainly of scattered farm houses,cottages, bungalows,estates and small local council estates. The latter including some individual terraced bungalows for old people. There is a rich mixture of old thatched attractive cottages full of character, some of which have been fully modernised and well designed modern bungalows, which are cleverly intermingled with the former.The villages are mainly of linear development with some infilling in the village of Cury. There are no real village centres with such linear development,though the shops in Berepper act as a central point in that area.
